Reviews.Title: Meets all expectations
Reviews.Author: Di An Putnam
Reviews.Content: My husband did all of the research and decided it on the SunBrite TV.  I it now up and he just loves it.  He has his outdoor "man" room.  It is very visible during the day and is easy to slip the protective cover over when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Some issues with mounting base
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Maselli
Reviews.Content: The two pieces of the top mounting base were very difficult to install as screws were small and holes not properly aligned.

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes weather proof dust cover and remote control
Integrated speakers for permanent outdoor installation
Bright, anti-glare LCD screen for improved outdoor viewing
High-impact ASA outdoor rated resin exterior to protect internal components from rain, dust, insects, humidity
Multi-fan airflow systems cools unit in extreme heat up to 122 F and can operate in cold weather to -24 F
ProductInfo.Name: Signature 3260HD 32" 720p LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV
